sentences.sentence: When my mother died I was inconsolable.
sentences.translation: 母亲去世的时候，我伤心欲绝。

sentences.sentence: They were inconsolable when their only child died.
sentences.translation: 他们唯一的孩子去世时，他们简直痛不欲生。

sentences.sentence: Photographs of Gana, looking stricken and inconsolable, attracted crowds to the zoo.
sentences.translation: 加娜的照片看起来饱受疾病折磨，悲痛欲绝，吸引很多人来到动物园。
